cast.name: 拉斯穆斯·哈迪克 Rasmus Hardiker

writer.name: Eva Lee Kuney Eva Lee Kuney

this_title: The Heroic Quest of the Valiant Prince Ivandoe
introduction: The series follows the adventures of Ivandoe , the young prince of the forest whose father, The Mighty Stag, sends him on a quest for the magical Golden Feather of the fearsome Eagle King. Ivandoe and his dedicated squire, a small bird named Bert ( discover new and mysterious areas of the forest and an array of peculiar creatures along the way.
foreign_title: The Heroic Quest of the Valiant Prince Ivandoe
